title: How to Remove Tough Strings from Celery

steps.title: Make a small cut at the base of the stalk.
steps.content: Make a small cut at the base of the stalk. This cut should be about 3cm/1.1" in length.

steps.title: Use a sharp knife to pull the strings down towards the cut.
steps.content: Use a sharp knife to pull the strings down towards the cut. When the strings reach the cut, the will lift automatically.

steps.title: Try an alternative method.
steps.content: Try an alternative method. If preferred, you can use a vegetable peeler and lightly peel off the strings.
